channel.title: SMF 79 Subtype 12 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 79 Subtype 12 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - altvm
item.description: Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fla.

item.title: Field - asl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79ASL Description LENGTH OF DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - asn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79ASN Description NUMBER OF DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - ass
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79ASS Description OFFSET TO DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF79S12 Based on: flg Description SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Data converted from version 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79CYC Description Sampling cycle length

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79DAT Description Date monitor interval start

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - dcl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79DCL Description LENGTH OF DATA CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - dcn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79DCN Description NUMBER OF DATA CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - dcs
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79DCS Description OFFSET TO DATA CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79DTE Description DATE RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Speed boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF79S12 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79FLA Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79FLG Description SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79GIE Description Projected gathering interval end GMT time

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IET Description Interval expiration time token

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description zIIP boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IML Description Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79INT Description Duration of monitor interval

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: Time monitor interval start Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IST Description Time monitor interval start

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79LEN Description SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79LGO Description Offset GMT to local time

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Record was written by RMF Monitor III Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mcl
item.description: LENGTH OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79MCL Description LENGTH OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - mcn
item.description: NUMBER OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79MCN Description NUMBER OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - mcs
item.description: OFFSET TO MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79MCS Description OFFSET TO MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MFV Description RMF version number

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MVS Description MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm)

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79OIL Description Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds)

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF79S12 Based on: flg Description OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRD Description Product name

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRF Description Processor flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79PRL Description LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79PRN Description NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79PRS Description OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PTN Description PR/SM partition number

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - qsl
item.description: LENGTH IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79QSL Description LENGTH IOQ GLOBAL SECTION

item.title: Field - qsn
item.description: NUMBER IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79QSN Description NUMBER IOQ GLOBAL SECTION

item.title: Field - qss
item.description: OFFSET IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79QSS Description OFFSET IOQ GLOBAL SECTION

item.title: Field - r79cacr
item.description: Channel Path acronym Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CACR Description Channel Path acronym

item.title: Field - r79cbl
item.description: BLOCK MULTIPLEXOR Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg2 Description BLOCK MULTIPLEXOR Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79cfg2.

item.title: Field - r79cbsy
item.description: Number of samples the channel path was busy, weighted by SRM. Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CBSY Description Number of samples the channel path was busy, weighted by SRM.

item.title: Field - r79cby
item.description: BYTE MULTIPLEXOR Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg2 Description BYTE MULTIPLEXOR Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79cfg2.

item.title: Field - r79ccc
item.description: Channel to Channel Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg2 Description Channel to Channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r79cfg2.

item.title: Field - r79ccdc
item.description: Channel characteristics changed Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg3 Description Channel characteristics changed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79cfg3.

item.title: Field - r79ccfgc
item.description: Configuration change Map: R79CCNTL Based on: r79cflg1 Description Configuration change Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79cflg1.

item.title: Field - r79ccfrc
item.description: CPMF restart count Map: R79CCNTL Based on: R79CCFRC Description CPMF restart count

item.title: Field - r79ccfsc
item.description: CPMF sample count Map: R79CCNTL Based on: R79CCFSC Description CPMF sample count

item.title: Field - r79ccmd
item.description: Configuration contains DCM managed channels Map: R79CCNTL Based on: r79cflg1 Description Configuration contains DCM managed channels Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79cflg1.

item.title: Field - r79ccmg
item.description: CPMF Channel Measurement Group Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CCMG Description CPMF Channel Measurement Group

item.title: Field - r79ccmh
item.description: DCM supported by hardware Map: R79CCNTL Based on: r79cflg1 Description DCM supported by hardware Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79cflg1.

item.title: Field - r79ccmi
item.description: CPMF mode info 0 - CPMF not active 1 - Compatibility mode 2 - Extended mode Map: R79CCNTL Based on: R79CCMI Description CPMF mode info 0 - CPMF not active 1 - Compatibility mode 2 - Extended mode

item.title: Field - r79ccnc
item.description: ES Connection Channel Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg2 Description ES Connection Channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79cfg2.

item.title: Field - r79ccpd
item.description: Channel path description. For an explanation, you can issue the command D M=CHP. Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CCPD Description Channel path description. For an explanation, you can issue the command D M=CHP.

item.title: Field - r79ccpid
item.description: CHANNEL PATH IDENTIFICATIONS. THE RANGE OF VALUES IS X'00’ TO X’FF' Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CCPID Description CHANNEL PATH IDENTIFICATIONS. THE RANGE OF VALUES IS X'00’ TO X’FF'

item.title: Field - r79ccpm
item.description: Channel path is DCM managed Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg3 Description Channel path is DCM managed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79cfg3.

item.title: Field - r79ccpmf
item.description: CPMF available Map: R79CCNTL Based on: r79cflg1 Description CPMF available Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79cflg1.

item.title: Field - r79ccpp
item.description: Channel path parameter Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CCPP Description Channel path parameter

item.title: Field - r79ccpts
item.description: Last CPMB entry time stamp in units of 128 microseconds (be aware that this time value wraps about every 35.79 minutes) Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CCPTS Description Last CPMB entry time stamp in units of 128 microseconds (be aware that this time value wraps about every 35.79 minutes)

item.title: Field - r79ccss
item.description: Channel Subsystem Id, only valid if R79CMCS = ON Map: R79CCNTL Based on: R79CCSS Description Channel Subsystem Id, only valid if R79CMCS = ON

item.title: Field - r79ccvc
item.description: ES Conversion Channel Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg2 Description ES Conversion Channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79cfg2.

item.title: Field - r79cdoc
item.description: ESCON Director on Channel Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg2 Description ESCON Director on Channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79cfg2.

item.title: Field - r79cecm
item.description: Enhanced channel measurement facility available Map: R79CCNTL Based on: r79cflg1 Description Enhanced channel measurement facility available Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79cflg1.

item.title: Field - r79cfg2
item.description: CHANNEL FLAGS Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CFG2 Description CHANNEL FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79cbl 2 BLOCK MULTIPLEXOR r79cby 3 BYTE MULTIPLEXOR r79ccvc 4 ES Conversion Channel r79ccnc 5 ES Connection Channel r79cdoc 6 ESCON Director on Channel r79ccc 7 Channel to Channel

item.title: Field - r79cfg3
item.description: Channel flags continued Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CFG3 Description Channel flags continued Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79cshr 0 Channel path is shared between logical partitions r79cnvl 1 CPMF indication, this entry is invalid r79cfxt 3 Channel converter 3090 r79ccpm 4 Channel path is DCM managed r79ccdc 5 Channel characteristics changed r79cxcm 6 Extended channel measurements / supported

item.title: Field - r79cfg4
item.description: Channel Path Flags Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CFG4 Description Channel Path Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79cwd1 0 CPMF Channel characteristics word 1 valid r79cwd2 1 CPMF Channel characteristics word 2 valid r79cwd3 2 CPMF Channel characteristics word 3 valid r79cwd4 3 CPMF Channel characteristics word 4 valid r79cwd5 4 CPMF Channel characteristics word 5 valid

item.title: Field - r79cflg1
item.description: Flags 1 Map: R79CCNTL Based on: R79CFLG1 Description Flags 1 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79ccpmf 0 CPMF available r79ccfgc 1 Configuration change r79ccmh 2 DCM supported by hardware r79ccmd 3 Configuration contains DCM managed channels r79crna 4 RMF address space not active r79cmcs 5 HW allows multiple channel subsystems r79cecm 6 Enhanced channel measurement facility available

item.title: Field - r79cfxt
item.description: Channel converter 3090 Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg3 Description Channel converter 3090 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79cfg3.

item.title: Field - r79cgen
item.description: Channel type generation Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CGEN Description Channel type generation

item.title: Field - r79cmbc
item.description: CPMF Maximum Bus Cycles per second (word 1) Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CMBC Description CPMF Maximum Bus Cycles per second (word 1)

item.title: Field - r79cmcs
item.description: HW allows multiple channel subsystems Map: R79CCNTL Based on: r79cflg1 Description HW allows multiple channel subsystems Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79cflg1.

item.title: Field - r79cmcu
item.description: CPMF Maximum Channel work Units per second (word 2) Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CMCU Description CPMF Maximum Channel work Units per second (word 2)

item.title: Field - r79cmru
item.description: CPMF Maximum Read data Units per second (word 4) Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CMRU Description CPMF Maximum Read data Units per second (word 4)

item.title: Field - r79cmwu
item.description: CPMF Maximum Write data Units per second (word 3) Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CMWU Description CPMF Maximum Write data Units per second (word 3)

item.title: Field - r79cnvl
item.description: CPMF indication, this entry is invalid Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg3 Description CPMF indication, this entry is invalid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79cfg3.

item.title: Field - r79cpby
item.description: Partitions channel-path-busy time in units of 128 micro seconds Map: R79CCHNL Based on: R79CPBY Description Partitions channel-path-busy time in units of 128 micro seconds

item.title: Field - r79cpds
item.description: CPMF LPAR Data units Sent count Map: R79CCM3 Based on: R79CPDS Description CPMF LPAR Data units Sent count

item.title: Field - r79cpdu
item.description: CPMF LPAR Data Unit size in bytes (word 1) Map: R79CCM3 Based on: R79CPDU Description CPMF LPAR Data Unit size in bytes (word 1)

item.title: Field - r79cpms
item.description: CPMF LPAR Message Sent units count Map: R79CCM3 Based on: R79CPMS Description CPMF LPAR Message Sent units count

item.title: Field - r79cpru
item.description: CPMF LPAR Read data Units Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CPRU Description CPMF LPAR Read data Units

item.title: Field - r79cpub
item.description: CPMF LPAR count of Unsuccessful attempts to receive messages due to unavailable Buffers Map: R79CCM3 Based on: R79CPUB Description CPMF LPAR count of Unsuccessful attempts to receive messages due to unavailable Buffers

item.title: Field - r79cpuc
item.description: CPMF LPAR channel work Unit Count Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CPUC Description CPMF LPAR channel work Unit Count

item.title: Field - r79cpum
item.description: CPMF LPAR Message sent Unit size (word 3) Map: R79CCM3 Based on: R79CPUM Description CPMF LPAR Message sent Unit size (word 3)

item.title: Field - r79cpus
item.description: CPMF LPAR count of Unsuccessful attempts to Send messages Map: R79CCM3 Based on: R79CPUS Description CPMF LPAR count of Unsuccessful attempts to Send messages

item.title: Field - r79cput
item.description: CPMF LPAR channel path busy Time in units of 128 microseconds Map: R79CCM1 Based on: R79CPUT Description CPMF LPAR channel path busy Time in units of 128 microseconds

item.title: Field - r79cpwu
item.description: CPMF LPAR Write data Units Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CPWU Description CPMF LPAR Write data Units

item.title: Field - r79crna
item.description: RMF address space not active Map: R79CCNTL Based on: r79cflg1 Description RMF address space not active Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79cflg1.

item.title: Field - r79cshr
item.description: Channel path is shared between logical partitions Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg3 Description Channel path is shared between logical partitions Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79cfg3.

item.title: Field - r79csmp
item.description: Number of samples weighted by SRM, only valid if R79CMCS = OFF Map: R79CCNTL Based on: R79CSMP Description Number of samples weighted by SRM, only valid if R79CMCS = OFF

item.title: Field - r79ctbc
item.description: CPMF Total Bus Cycles Count Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CTBC Description CPMF Total Bus Cycles Count

item.title: Field - r79ctds
item.description: CPMF Total Data units Sent count Map: R79CCM3 Based on: R79CTDS Description CPMF Total Data units Sent count

item.title: Field - r79ctdu
item.description: CPMF Total Data Unit size in bytes (word 2) Map: R79CCM3 Based on: R79CTDU Description CPMF Total Data Unit size in bytes (word 2)

item.title: Field - r79ctext
item.description: Command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTEXT Description Command text

item.title: Field - r79ctms
item.description: CPMF Total Message Sent units count Map: R79CCM3 Based on: R79CTMS Description CPMF Total Message Sent units count

item.title: Field - r79ctru
item.description: CPMF Total Read data Units Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CTRU Description CPMF Total Read data Units

item.title: Field - r79ctub
item.description: CPMF Total count of Unsuccessful attempts to receive messages due to unavailable Buffers Map: R79CCM3 Based on: R79CTUB Description CPMF Total count of Unsuccessful attempts to receive messages due to unavailable Buffers

item.title: Field - r79ctuc
item.description: CPMF Total channel work Unit Count Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CTUC Description CPMF Total channel work Unit Count

item.title: Field - r79ctum
item.description: CPMF Total Message sent Unit size (word 4) Map: R79CCM3 Based on: R79CTUM Description CPMF Total Message sent Unit size (word 4)

item.title: Field - r79ctut
item.description: CPMF Total channel path busy Time in units of 128 microseconds Map: R79CCM1 Based on: R79CTUT Description CPMF Total channel path busy Time in units of 128 microseconds

item.title: Field - r79ctwu
item.description: CPMF Total Write data Units Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CTWU Description CPMF Total Write data Units

item.title: Field - r79ctxtl
item.description: Length of command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTXTL Description Length of command text

item.title: Field - r79cus
item.description: CPMF data Unit Size in bytes (word 5) Map: R79CCM2 Based on: R79CUS Description CPMF data Unit Size in bytes (word 5)

item.title: Field - r79cwd1
item.description: CPMF Channel characteristics word 1 valid Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg4 Description CPMF Channel characteristics word 1 valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79cfg4.

item.title: Field - r79cwd2
item.description: CPMF Channel characteristics word 2 valid Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg4 Description CPMF Channel characteristics word 2 valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79cfg4.

item.title: Field - r79cwd3
item.description: CPMF Channel characteristics word 3 valid Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg4 Description CPMF Channel characteristics word 3 valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79cfg4.

item.title: Field - r79cwd4
item.description: CPMF Channel characteristics word 4 valid Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg4 Description CPMF Channel characteristics word 4 valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79cfg4.

item.title: Field - r79cwd5
item.description: CPMF Channel characteristics word 5 valid Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg4 Description CPMF Channel characteristics word 5 valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79cfg4.

item.title: Field - r79cxcm
item.description: Extended channel measurements / supported Map: R79CCHNL Based on: r79cfg3 Description Extended channel measurements / supported Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79cfg3.

item.title: Field - r79cxoc
item.description: Total number of FICON command mode operations (CPC) that have been attempted by the channel Map: R79CXCM2 Based on: R79CXOC Description Total number of FICON command mode operations (CPC) that have been attempted by the channel

item.title: Field - r79cxod
item.description: Total number of FICON command mode operations (CPC) that could not be initiated by the channel due to a lack of available resources Map: R79CXCM2 Based on: R79CXOD Description Total number of FICON command mode operations (CPC) that could not be initiated by the channel due to a lack of available resources

item.title: Field - r79cxos
item.description: Summation count of FICON command-mode operations (CPC). Each time the number of FICON command-mode operations is incremented, the number of FICON command-mode operations active at the channel, including the one being initiated, is added to this field. (doubleword format) Map: R79CXCM2 Based on: R79CXOS Description Summation count of FICON command-mode operations (CPC). Each time the number of FICON command-mode operations is incremented, the number of FICON command-mode operations active at the channel, including the one being initiated, is added to this field.

item.title: Field - r79cxtc
item.description: Total number of FICON transport mode operations (CPC) that have been attempted by the channel. Zero when no zHPF. Map: R79CXCM2 Based on: R79CXTC Description Total number of FICON transport mode operations (CPC) that have been attempted by the channel. Zero when no zHPF.

item.title: Field - r79cxtd
item.description: Total number of FICON transport mode operations (CPC) that could not be initiated by the channel due to a lack of available resources. Zero when no zHPF. Map: R79CXCM2 Based on: R79CXTD Description Total number of FICON transport mode operations (CPC) that could not be initiated by the channel due to a lack of available resources. Zero when no zHPF.

item.title: Field - r79cxts
item.description: Summation count of FICON transport-mode operations (CPC). Each time the number of FICON transport-mode operations is incremented, the number of transport-mode operations active at the channel, including the one being initiated, is added to this field. Zero when no zHPF. (doubleword format) Map: R79CXCM2 Based on: R79CXTS Description Summation count of FICON transport-mode operations (CPC). Each time the number of FICON transport-mode operations is incremented, the number of transport-mode operations active at the channel, including the one being initiated, is added to this field.

item.title: Field - r79dtext
item.description: Default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTEXT Description Default DR text

item.title: Field - r79dtxtl
item.description: Length default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTXTL Description Length default DR text

item.title: Field - r79goal
item.description: System is in GOAL mode Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description System is in GOAL mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79gtod
item.description: Time when the call to data gatherer was issued Map: R79CHL Based on: R79GTOD Description Time when the call to data gatherer was issued

item.title: Field - r79inv
item.description: inval. data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description inval. data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ist
item.description: Monitor I interval start time Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IST Description Monitor I interval start time

item.title: Field - r79iwmtk
item.description: Token returned from IWMRCOLL service Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IWMTK Description Token returned from IWMRCOLL service

item.title: Field - r79lf2
item.description: Flag byte Map: R79CHL Based on: R79LF2 Description Flag byte Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79par 0 Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering r79sg 1 Report sorted by SG r79rsm 2 Invalid RSM data obtained r79goal 3 System is in GOAL mode r79trxi 4 Invalid transaction data r79srmc 5 SRM mode changed r79inv 6 inval. data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) r79maxd 7 Incomplete device data due to too many devices

item.title: Field - r79maxd
item.description: Incomplete device data due to too many devices Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Incomplete device data due to too many devices Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79nxt
item.description: Number of data sections in following small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79NXT Description Number of data sections in following small records

item.title: Field - r79par
item.description: Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79rid
item.description: Measurement name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79RID Description Measurement name

item.title: Field - r79rsm
item.description: Invalid RSM data obtained Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Invalid RSM data obtained Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ses
item.description: Session name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79SES Description Session name

item.title: Field - r79sg
item.description: Report sorted by SG Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Report sorted by SG Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79srmc
item.description: SRM mode changed Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description SRM mode changed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tot
item.description: Total number of data sections in large record Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TOT Description Total number of data sections in large record

item.title: Field - r79trxi
item.description: Invalid transaction data Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Invalid transaction data Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tsr
item.description: Total number of small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TSR Description Total number of small records

item.title: Field - r79user
item.description: User field Map: R79CHL Based on: R79USER Description User field

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAL Description Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAN Description Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAO Description Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF79S12 Based on: flg Description NEW RECORD FORMAT Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79RTY Description RECORD TYPE

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SAM Description Number of samples

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79SEG Description SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79SID Description SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SNM Description System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SRL Description SMF record level

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79SSI Description SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF )

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79STY Description SUBTYPE

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF79S12 Based on: flg Description SUBTYPES USED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SYN Description SYNC value in seconds

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF79S12 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TIME RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79TME Description TIME RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF79S12 Based on: SMF79TRN Description NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF79S12 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF79S12 Based on: flg Description MVS/XA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79XNM Description Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX
